title: [bug] Updater - Tauri API error: Invalid cross-device link (os error 18)
body:
### Describe the bug

During the installUpdate() call, I receive the error "Tauri API error: Invalid cross-device link (os error 18)". I'm using a statically hosted update file following the [Update File JSON Format](https://tauri.app/v1/guides/distribution/updater/#update-file-json-format). I have the updater dialog set to false. I'm trying to update an AppImage.

I found another "Invalid cross-device link" [error](https://github.com/core-api/python-client/issues/176) in an unrelated python project.
